Salem.John McLoughlin (Proctor): John McLoughlin, also known as Dr. John McLoughlin, is an outdoor 1953 bronze sculpture of John McLoughlin by Alexander Phimister Proctor and completed by his son Gifford MacGregor Proctor, installed at the Oregon State Capitol grounds in Salem, Oregon, United States. The statue was created by A. Proctor, who died in 1950, and finished by G. Proctor before its dedication in 1953.
